title: My Pixel 3XL battery percentage showing wrong. it always at 3% even if i charge.
content: My Pixel 3XL battery percentage showing wrong. it always at 3% even if i charge. after charge can use upto 8-10 hours but its showing always 3% battery. Please help to resolve. tried restarting turned off and kept for 1 hour. only didn't reset. but i recently reset the phone 1 month back.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
